entries.title: Financial World Celebrates Slowing Wage and Employment Growth in New Jobs Report
entries.description:
In the debate over American workers’ welfare versus the Federal Reserve’s inflation-cooling rate hikes, the workers are losing.

The post Financial World Celebrates Slowing Wage and Employment Growth in New Jobs Report appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Biden’s Border Plan Drapes Trump Policies in Liberal Rhetoric
entries.description:
The U.S. border regime is cruel whether it is enforced by a president spewing racist slurs or one appealing to “safe and orderly processing."

The post Biden’s Border Plan Drapes Trump Policies in Liberal Rhetoric appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: The GOP's Kevin McCarthy Debacle Is an Insurrection by Other Means
entries.description:
Two years after January 6, Republicans are still locked in a battle for personal political power.

The post The GOP’s Kevin McCarthy Debacle Is an Insurrection by Other Means appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Israel's Rightward Turn
entries.description:
Ultranationalists are in the driver's seat in Israel's new government.

The post Israel’s Rightward Turn appeared first on The Intercept.
